content:
@nikomatsakis fyi, I reworked the impl to no longer rely on pending obligations quite as much -- maybe a bit more to go. The few cases I tried from crater seem to work now, so I've enqueued a try build to re-run crater. It might be good if you want to take a quick look at the impl and see if there's terrible things I've done (in particular, the coercion-related code is a definite mess...)

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84573 is the PR still, mostly the last 2 commits are relevant -- those are the new impl rework.
(Obviously no rush. Happy to discuss at our next 1:1 or otherwise).
